imdb.plot outline: How grueling is the daily life of a soldier? "Real Men" is a South Korean reality show that follows popular celebrities as they get a taste of life in the military. Most men in South Korean are required to serve two years of mandatory military service. Actors, music idols and other celebrities get a taste of a soldier's life as they experience the military for the first or second time. Even female celebrities have undergone the tough military training in all-female editions of the show.
imdb.title: Real Men
plot: How grueling is the daily life of a soldier? "_Real Men_ (qv)" is a South Korean reality show that follows popular celebrities as they get a taste of life in the military. Most men in South Korean are required to serve two years of mandatory military service. Actors, music idols and other celebrities get a taste of a soldier's life as they experience the military for the first or second time. Even female celebrities have undergone the tough military training in all-female editions of the show.
